actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Administrator of General Services to acquire leasehold interests in certain land located in Los Angeles, Calif., in order to provide parking for persons who have business in the U.S. Federal Courthouse and for Federal employees working in the courthouse.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Administrator of General Services to acquire leasehold interests in specified land located in Los Angeles, California, in order to provide parking for persons who have business in the United States Federal courthouse and for Federal employees working in the courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Administrator of General Services to acquire leasehold interests in certain land located in Los Angeles, Calif., in order to provide parking for persons who have business in the U.S. Federal Courthouse and for Federal employees working in the courthouse.
